scripts.install: npm run-script build:addon & npm run-script build:client & npm run-script build:server
scripts.build:client: %EMSCRIPTENROOT%\em++ --std=c++11 --bind cpp/HashifyNameBindings.cpp -I/cpp cpp/HashifyName.cpp -s MODULARIZE=1 -s WASM=0 -s WASM_ASYNC_COMPILATION=0 -s ENVIRONMENT='web' -s EXPORT_ES6=0 -s USE_ES6_IMPORT_META=0 -o ./client.js
scripts.build:server: %EMSCRIPTENROOT%\em++ --std=c++11 --bind cpp/HashifyNameBindings.cpp -I/cpp cpp/HashifyName.cpp -s MODULARIZE=1 -s WASM=0 -s WASM_ASYNC_COMPILATION=0 -s ENVIRONMENT='node' -s EXPORT_ES6=0 -s USE_ES6_IMPORT_META=0 -o ./server.js
